 This is a table containing the figures from the ECDC Influenza A Situation Updates issued in August 2009 roughly three times a week. From 10 August, ECDC only published deaths totals outside its area. The table can by sorted by country, date of first confirmed case or date of first confirmed case by continent. This presentation of the data in this and other tables may show the progression, peaks, and, eventually, decline of the epidemic in each country and continent. Summary tables | Previous month | Next month Swine flu cases, August 2009 By date By cont.
